name: MacroTech, Inc.
description:
A game about racing the clock, getting things, bringing them back to a location, and using them.  Gather items to progress and get both you and a guy stuck in a security booth out of a facility full of robot arms on legs with saw blades.  You only have 9 minutes to sprint around the facility and get you both out.

Made vaguely in a PS1 style for the 32bit Jam 2022 in two weeks.

Supports controller and keyboard, but you should probably stick with keyboard.

There's a map in the game folder.  It's kind of important for the game.
